TextLang.Text: To perform this operation, you must quit [%1]. Do you want to quit the software now?
There is not enough free space on the hard disk. At least %1 more free space is needed.
The data type is not supported.
An error occurred during the delete operation.
There is not enough free space on the hard disk.
The maximum number of content items that can be added has been reached.
ATRAC is not enabled. Go to [Settings] > [System Settings] and enable ATRAC.
WMA playback is not enabled. Go to [Settings] > [System Settings] and enable WMA playback.
The connection to the server timed out.
This operation is not available here.
If you do not have a Facebook account, sign up for an account at www.facebook.com using a PC.

You can share information on Facebook about items such as trophies you have earned and content you have purchased in PlayStation®Store. Go to [Facebook] under [PlayStation®Network] > [Account Management] to set these options.

When this option is selected, the content will be available for viewing by the broadest range of people that can be set for this network service. Even if this option is not selected, the content may be viewable by some people. To check details on how broadly the content will be able to be viewed or to change your settings, access the website for the network service using a PC.
The user name or password is not correct.

Add the video content that you want to edit or upload. Content items will be displayed in the order you add them. You cannot add content items that were copied to the system with system software versions earlier than 3.40, or copyright-protected content items.
You cannot add content items that were copied to the system with system software versions earlier than 3.40, or copyright-protected content items.
You can edit a video that you like, upload it to a video sharing website, and then invite your friends to view the video.
Deletes specified scenes. Set [A] at the starting point and set [B] at the ending point of a scene. Select [OK] to delete the scene.
Do you want to delete the specified scenes?
Select the range that you want to undo.
Inserts text. Set [T] at the point of the video where you want to insert text.
Set how long to display the text in seconds.
Changes the playback speed for specified scenes.
Changes the playback speed for specified scenes. Set [A] at the starting point and set [B] at the ending point of a scene.
The range you set will be cleared.
Select the range for which you want to change the playback speed.
Sets the music for the entire video.
Uploads the edited video to a video sharing website.
Saves the edited content on this system.

When you use this feature, you may not upload content containing movies, photographs, music or other material protected by law, including copyright, trademark or rights of privacy or publicity, unless you have the rights from the owner to do so.
To ensure that your work will be enjoyed by others, please confirm it does not contain the following:
・Adult themes, such as sex, drugs and violence
・Hateful, menacing, threatening, abusive or discriminatory content
・Other material prohibited as per the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement
Upload completed. The content has been uploaded as multiple files because it exceeds the maximum playback time allowed for uploading to this service.
The maximum number of content items that can be created has been reached.
No more content items can be added. The total playback time exceeds the maximum amount of time that is allowed.
This content is not available because of parental control restrictions.
The latest update data has been found. The system will quit this software and start installing.
This service is busy. Try again later.
Do you want to cancel the upload operation?
You cannot upload this content. There is not enough free space.
This service cannot be used on this account.
Do you want to cancel the download operation?
An error occurred during the save operation.
An error occurred during communication with the server. This is a DNS error.
You must sign up for PlayStation®Network. Do you want to sign up now?
To use this feature, you must first download software. Do you want to download now?
About Us | Privacy Policy | Terms of Service
This service is not available in your country/region.
The following characters cannot be entered: %1
